attachments.service_name: Apply to the TechCrunch Hardware Battlefield at CES.
attachments.title: Apply TCDisrupt
attachments.text: TechCrunch's Hardware Battlefield at CES is the premiere launch competition for seed stage hardware companies. Teams compete for $50,000, the Metal Man trophy and the interest of top investors. Former judges include investors from Y-Combinator, HAX, Highway1, GM, KPCB, First Mark Capital, Google Ventures, Indiegogo and Fitbit.
attachments.fallback: Apply to the TechCrunch Hardware Battlefield at CES.: Apply TCDisrupt

text: To live the Silicon Valley dream
